Tamara Taylor.description: conversing about conversing about helping each other with the busy customers and tasks that need to be done behind the counter @ <persona> Carmen Ortiz
chat: Tamara Taylor
Hey Carmen, how's it going with the customers?
Carmen Ortiz
Hey Tamara, it's been quite busy with the customers today. There's been a steady flow of people coming in.
Tamara Taylor
Do you need any help? I can come and assist you for a while.
Carmen Ortiz
Thanks Tamara, that would be great! I could use some help behind the counter.
Tamara Taylor
Sure, I'll be right there. Let me finish up what I'm doing and I'll come help you.
Carmen Ortiz
Thank you, Tamara. I really appreciate your help!
Tamara Taylor
I'll be there in a few minutes. Just let me finish up.
Carmen Ortiz
Take your time, there's no rush. I'll be waiting for you behind the counter.
Tamara Taylor
I'm almost done here, just a few more minutes.
Carmen Ortiz
Take your time, there's no rush. I'll be waiting for you behind the counter.
Tamara Taylor
I'm finished now. Let's go and help the customers.
Carmen Ortiz
Thank you, Tamara. I really appreciate your help!
Tamara Taylor
What tasks need to be done behind the counter?
Carmen Ortiz
We need to restock the shelves and organize the new inventory. Can you start with that?
Tamara Taylor
Sure, I can start by restocking the shelves and organizing the new inventory.
Carmen Ortiz
Thanks Tamara! While you restock the shelves, I'll handle the cash register.
